titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that Fort Crailo in Rensselaer, New York, should be designated as the home of "Yankee Doodle".

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Referred to Subcommittee on Census and Population.

House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 3/3/1987--Introduced. Recognizes Dr. Richard Shuckburg as the primary author of the tune "Yankee Doodle" and Fort Crailo in Rensselaer, New York, as the home of Yankee Doodle.
